transcription.english:
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Hello"
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Hello Nikhil ji, I am from Solar Square."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan ji bolye."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Mujhe ek do cheez aur janni thi, aapka khud ka ghar hai ya flat system hai sir."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan, bolye, bolye. Haan, bolye bolye."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan, bolye bolye."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Nahi nahi, khud ka ghar hai mam."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Aur meter property pe kiska naam hai sir."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan. Aapka naam hai? Haan, nahi mera daddy ke naam pe hai."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Accha, wo aapke saath?"
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Ek mummy ke naam pe, ek dadi ke naam pe."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Accha, matlab property kiske naam pe hai, wo aapke saare family owner hai? Family owner."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Okay okay."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Aur matlab main decision aap lenge ya aapke parents lenge."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Main hi lunga."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay okay. Aur sir aapka bijli ka bill abhi kitna aa ja raha hai."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Around 4 to 5000."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Aur aapka jo chhat hai, uska square feet kitna hoga sir."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "2000."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay. Aur aapka matlab jo chhat ke aazubaju koi badi building, ped jiska chhao aata ho, aisa kuch issue hai."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Nahi nahi, sabki badi badi building hai, koi issue nahi."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Aur shade dala hua hai ya khula open chhat hai."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Nahi nahi, shade kaise, terrace upar hi jayega na."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Nahi nahi, bahut log aise team ka shade deke rakhte hai."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Nahi nahi, aisa kuch nahi hai. Aisa kuch nahi hai."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay. Aur sir, aap ek ghanta time de paoge na, Sunday ko jab bhejungi to."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan haan, bilkul bilkul."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Time kya rahega sir Sunday."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "11, 11 baje ke aas paas."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay sir, aap mujhe to address bata denge, main note kar leti hu."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Aap phone kar dijiye, plot number 27, NIT layout, NHIT, N for Nikhil, NIT, okay."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay. Plot number 27, NHIT, layout?"
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "NHIT, N for Nikhil, N I T."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay. NHIT, layout, Trisharan nagar."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Trisharan nagar? T R I S H A R A N. Trisharan nagar. Opposite Somalwar school."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Opposite Somalwar school?"
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "S O M A L W A R."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay. Somalwar school. Kharnar nagar."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "K H A R N A R."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Kharnar, Nagpur, pin code?"
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "440025."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "440025. Okay sir. Konsi company ka hai ye?"
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Solar Square energy sir."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Acha, Solar Square energy, theek hai. Okay sir, main aapko WhatsApp pe message kar deti hu, possible time bata dijiye."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan, kar dijiye, kar dijiye. Current location bhi bhej dijiye."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Haan, main bhej dungi. Tumko turant bhejti hu WhatsApp pe."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Isme kon se panel use karte hai aap mam."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Sir, hamara char panel rehta hai, Navitas, Cizon, premium and renewal ka rehta hai. Aur go humari property checklist follow karke hum taiyar karte hain, kyunki aaj jo panel hai wo tufan vagera ki wajah se bahut ud rahe hain, aisa issues saamne aate hain, isliye hum proper tarike se follow karke panel taiyar karte hain, property check karke. Toh ek dam 25-30 saal easy life ko mil sakti hai."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan haan, theek hai, theek hai."
- speaker: speaker_1
  line: "Okay sir, main message karti hu, current location bhej dijiye."
- speaker: speaker_0
  line: "Haan haan."

speaker_analysis.speaker: speaker_0
speaker_analysis.details: The customer sounds polite and cooperative throughout the call.

speaker_analysis.speaker: speaker_1
speaker_analysis.details: The agent is clear, polite, and efficiently gathers necessary information for a site visit.

assessment.summary: This call is between a customer and an agent from Solar Square Energy. The agent is gathering information to schedule a site visit for solar panel installation. The customer confirms they own their house, provides details about the property size, electricity bills, and confirms their availability for a visit on Sunday. The agent also explains the type of panels used and their durability. The agent effectively collects all necessary details and schedules the visit.
assessment.recommendations: The agent's performance was excellent. They were professional, clear, and gathered all the necessary information efficiently. It is recommended to continue this level of service. Ensure the follow-up message is sent promptly with all confirmed details for the site visit.
